article_title: Remote Area Medical Depicts Where Obamacare Falls Short
article_text:
Japan Seeks 'Crisis' Language in G-7 Statement

34:59 - At the G-7 Leaders Summit, Bloomberg has seen a draft communique warning that the global economy is at risk of "falling into crisis." Leaders are still working on their final statement to be released as they wrap up their two day summit in Ise-Shima. Bloomberg's Yvonne Man reports on "First Up." (Source: Bloomberg)

article_metadata.description: Dec. 4 (Bloomberg) -- Stan Brock, founder of Remote Area Medical, and Farihah Zamar, co-director and co-producer of  "Remote Area Medical," a new documentary film about the group's work, discuss their efforts to help people who don't have health insurance. They speak with Bloomberg's Pimm Fox on "Taking Stock." (Source: Bloomberg)
